about.intro: I am a dedicated Information Technology undergraduate with a passion for solving complex problems through innovative technology solutions.

features.title: Problem Solver
features.text: I thrive on identifying challenges and developing solutions.

features.title: Team Collaborator
features.text: Strong communication skills and teamwork experience.

features.title: Fast Learner
features.text: Adaptable and quick to master new technologies.

education.course_strand: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

projects.title: Cybersecurity Threat Analyzer
projects.description: Advanced machine learning-based threat detection system that analyzes network traffic patterns and identifies potential security breaches in real-time.

projects.title: Network Security Architecture Research
projects.description: Comprehensive research paper on modern network security architectures and their implementation strategies in enterprise environments.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, animated, responsive portfolio built with Bootstrap and vanilla JS featuring dynamic content loading and smooth animations.

projects.title: AI-Enhanced Security Framework
projects.description: Implementation framework for integrating artificial intelligence into cybersecurity operations for enhanced threat detection and response.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: A scalable socket-based chat application with user authentication, private rooms, file sharing, and message encryption.

projects.title: Machine Learning in Cybersecurity Analysis
projects.description: Detailed analysis of machine learning applications in cybersecurity, including threat detection algorithms and behavioral analysis techniques.

projects.title: Network Security Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive real-time monitoring dashboard for network security metrics with automated threat detection and alert systems.

exposure.title: Cybersecurity Club Mentor
highlights: Led weekly hands-on sessions on Wireshark and Nmap
Organized mini CTF challenges for 40+ students
Guided peers on responsible disclosure practices

exposure.title: Open-Source Contributor
highlights: Fixed accessibility issues and improved documentation
Contributed performance improvements to a JS utility lib

exposure.title: Tech Community Volunteer
highlights: Taught basic web development to high school students
Set up workshop laptops and network connectivity
